name: ComposeScrollbars
shortDescription: The ComposeScrollbars is a feature-rich Android Compose UI library that seamlessly incorporates customizable scrollbars, including size, animations, background/knob layer style, and scroll behavior.
longDescription: The ComposeScrollbars is a feature-rich Android Compose UI library that seamlessly incorporates customizable scrollbars, including size, animations, background/knob layer style, and scroll behavior.
